channel.title: Eotenweard - The Prefect's Gift
channel.description:
**NEW PLAYER INITIATIVE: PLEASE DO NOT RSVP FOR THE FIRST 72 HOURS IF YOU HAVE ALREADY PLAYED, OR ARE ALREADY GOING TO PLAY, IN ONE OF MY GAMES THIS YEAR.**
4 sessions of my PbtA game of Dark Age monster hunting, on Thursdays in May at 7pm (GMT+1)
![AR's Eotenweard Gauntlet AP Video Thumbnail|377x500](upload://s8vYEDBk1brWFtGaGoCXGETHAz9.jpeg) 7th May: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4sria7PbEuGMehy4TL 14th May: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4ssXc9FCwD3kNyLLUK 21st May: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4sslv0g0Yi_cO-i4py 28th May: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4st3FLFAp4wz3ZDteS
The Romano-British 'Prefect' of Danum is offering money to anyone who can kill a demon ... all in a day's work ... Will your band of characters take Fate by the throat and make their own Destiny? Will they step into the Dark and bring the Light? Will they Forge their stories with Blood and Iron?

item.title: Eotenweard - The Prefect's Gift
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

Eotenweard - The Prefect’s Gift (3/3)
The anger that Morwenna the Pagan Mystic feels for her patron, the goddess Brigit, finds release in the burning of a Great Hall, while the Revenant, Aelfwyn, confronts her husband, Ulric ‘The Fish of Torksey’, before excaping with the relic claimed by Christ but owned by Brigit. They return to Danum but the potents are unclear on who has been possessed by the Demon they seek to banish. After a mis-step Aelfwyn makes a fateful decison and Morwenna finds a cause …

Read full topic

item.title: Eotenweard - The Prefect's Gift
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

Eotenweard - The Prefect’s Gift (2/3)
Morwenna the Pagan Mystic is shaken by what she has sensed and runs to the forest in search of guidance while our Priest of God, having been bitten by ‘the Demon’, owes the Dark Old Gods a debt … and almost everything he tries has consequences. Though Aelfwyn the Saxon Revenant negotiates a way out of Danum, Gunjar the Hammer of the Gods is determned to make a fight of it … and then there’s a haunted monastery … one character challenges a foe to discover a mentor, another makes an offer to the servants of a god not their own, and one is unnerved by bone chilling cold …

Read full topic

item.title: Eotenweard - The Prefect's Gift
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

The Prefect’s Gift (1/4)
The characters travel to Danum where the settlement’s Prefect is offering a wondrous gift to anyone who will kill a Demon for him. Aelfwynn, the haughty Revenant Saxon lady, overplays her hand and only Gunjar, the Hammer of the Gods, can re-establish their credibility through a trial by combat. Morwenna the Pagan Mystic confirms there is evil in the old man caged behind the Prefect’s Hall but neither she, nor Ceganos the Priest of God, are convinced he is a Demon …

Read full topic
